title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7000.7 - Reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7000.7 - Reports

State Regulations
(a) On or after the
first day of April each year, the trustees shall prepare an annual report of
the activities and operations of the fund during the preceding year. The report
shall be transmitted to the Governor, the Legislature, the Court of Appeals and
the State Comptroller. (b) The
trustees may issue periodic reports to the public concerning the activities and
procedures of the fund. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
7000.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
